name: MonsoonSoundsforSleep
0:
”Alexa open monsoon sounds”
”Alexa ask monsoon sounds to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: monsoon sounds
des:
Let the sounds of a monsoon downpour lull you right to sleep. 

All you need to do is say Alexa start Monsoon Sounds, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
